DOC.brief_title: Intravascular Ultrasound Guided Drug Eluting Stent Implantation `` All-comers '' Coronary Lesions
DOC.detailed_description: The study prospectively conduct 6 high-volume PCI center China IVUS expertise . Clinic follow-up plan patient 12 month implantation drug elute stent . Primary endpoint composite cardiac death myocardial infraction . The study power primary endpoint , likely reach significance level P < 0.05 even follow-up drop-out rate 10 % .
